definitions.definition: An auditory tone of low pitch or volume .
An implicit message perceived subtly alongside, but not detracting noticeably from, the explicit message conveyed in or by a book, film, speech or similar (contrast with overtone ); an undercurrent .
A pale colour , or one seen underneath another colour.
A low state of the physical faculties .

main_definition: An auditory tone of low pitch or volume .
secondary_definitions: An implicit message perceived subtly alongside, but not detracting noticeably from, the explicit message conveyed in or by a book, film, speech or similar (contrast with overtone ); an undercurrent .
A pale colour , or one seen underneath another colour.
A low state of the physical faculties .
